name: Bug fix
body: - Segmentation Fault with user defined rule #311

name: New feature
body:
We can now change the start definition rule.

- Changing root feature #304

name: Expose a choice field for SemanticValues in dictionaries #291
body: Expose a choice field for SemanticValues in dictionaries #291

name: Case insensitive dictionary support
body: - Grammar performance, dictionary case insensitive not accepted #286

name: Bug fixes
body:
Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-peglib/issues/269 and https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-peglib/issues/273
Implement https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-peglib/pull/278 in another way based on `[https://github.com/tinfoilboy…](https://github.com/tinfoilboy/CTML/blob/master/CMakeLists.txt%60)

name: Bug fixes
body:
- s.choice() always returns 0 when %whitespace is defined. (#266)
- Compilation error when trying to pass both any& dt and an output param to peg::parser::parse() (#270)

name: Fix "Lint with trace on error segfaults" (#246)
body: Lint with trace on error segfaults #246

name: Fixed word expression problem with Dictionary
Enhancement for better custom error message
Custom error message for definition
body:
* Support custom error message for definition
* 'message' instruction has been renamed to 'error_message' (Breaking change)

name: New features
body:
* Added [...]i and [^...]i (Fix https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-peglib/issues/220)
* Removed peg::parse_error and introduced predicate action

name: Some new features and bug fixes
body:
* Profiler support
* Infinite loop problem (#211, #213)
* Automatic EOI support
* Support C++20 char8_t

name: Bug fixes and profile feature
body:
- Improved error report for literal string with %word
- Fix problem with undefined back reference (#206)
- Profile feature (#200)

name: Error report problem and concise trace mode support
body:
- Updated concise trace mode
- Fixed https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-peglib/issues/202 again

name: Better error report
body:
Odd unexpected #202
Infinite loop problem with %whitespace #205

name: Improvements
body:
[Allow more than one instruction](https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-peglib/commit/82fd01f3d10215a9d9e09bd71f9984732d91527a)
Missing mention to "rep" in operators list in README (#193)
Error parsing valid charset class (#195)
Added '\f' and '\v'
Taking too much time to load/parse grammar (#197)

name: Fix problem with parsing infix expression
Fix Packrat parsing and Infinite loop detection problems
Support for C++17 compilers that don't have <charconv>
